rows.label: qst701006_msg0001
rows.name:
No matter how many times you
come, it won't change. Go home.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm really going to go,
you know? Is that okay?

rows.label: qst701006_msg0003
rows.name: Rita!? Why...

rows.label: qst701006_msg0004
rows.name: Because I was worried about you, Dad!

rows.label: qst701006_msg0005
rows.name:
Dad, are you pushing
yourself? Are you okay?

rows.label: qst701006_msg0006
rows.name: ...Yeah. And you?

rows.label: qst701006_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm doing great! Thanks to
Kaede-chan and everyone else!

rows.label: qst701006_msg0008
rows.name: ...Why are they here?

rows.label: qst701006_msg0009
rows.name:
You see, they're my saviors! They saved
me when I was about to collapse, and they
pushed me forward when I was lost.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0010
rows.name: ......Is that so.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0011
rows.name:
I heard. That the
capital is in trouble.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0012
rows.name:
You've always thought of the
buildings you've made like your
own children, haven't you, Dad?

rows.label: qst701006_msg0013
rows.name:
So... you were frustrated, weren't you? Your
precious children were destroyed before your
eyes, and you were so sad and anxious.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0014
rows.name:
...Just remembering that
day tears me apart.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0015
rows.name:
Even now, I want to punch them. Both the
ones who destroyed the capital, and myself
for not being able to do anything.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0016
rows.name:
You can do something! Your hands,
Dad, can make and fix things. You
have to take care of them.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0017
rows.name:
...I'm sorry I wasn't there for
you in such a difficult time.
That's what I came back to say.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0018
rows.name: Rita...

rows.label: qst701006_msg0019
rows.name:
...About the shelter we discussed earlier.
It should be possible if we expand the inn's
basement. If we can gather the materials.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0020
rows.name: Eh... you'll help?

rows.label: qst701006_msg0021
rows.name:
If it's a request from my daughter's
saviors, I must cooperate.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0022
rows.name: Dad! Thank you!!

rows.label: qst701006_msg0023
rows.name:
That's amazing. It's like
he was never against it.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0024
rows.name:
That's what's difficult and
interesting about people.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0025
rows.name:
Everyone! According to my dad, we
need Muscle Branches, Bismuth Slabs,
Puzzletree Wood, and, um...

rows.label: qst701006_msg0026
rows.name:
Deer Wood and Alloy Sheeting.
We need a certain amount
of these materials.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0027
rows.name:
Shelters have to be built sturdy,
so we need a lot of materials.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0028
rows.name:
And, my dad is going to start preparations
at the inn, so he wants you to bring
the gathered materials there.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0029
rows.name: Leave it to me. I'll gather them all!

rows.label: qst701006_msg0030
rows.name:
I'll help as much as I can! And,
I'll ask around to see if anyone
else is willing to help!

rows.label: qst701006_msg0031
rows.name:
...Adel-sama. What I said the
other day was my true feeling.
But I am grateful for my daughter.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0032
rows.name: I will repay this debt with my work.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0033
rows.name:
Those words alone are enough.
Your thoughts are your own.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0034
rows.name:
Thank you for your
cooperation, Zain-san.
